overview:
Start learning a new language just by walking around your home or office. 50 % of all conversation is based on 100 words. With Lingibli you can learn them and understand a language in no time! —————————-

Languages: Arabic, Catalan, Czech, Danish, German, Greek, English, Spanish, Finnish, French, Italian, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Swedish, Turkish. —————————-

LEARN AT HOME: Label things in your home or office and learn easily with the Lingibli App.

FEEL SECURE ABROAD: Have the most important phrases with you.

PLAY WORD GAMES WITH A CHILD: Let a child search for words around your home. —————————-

LINGIBLI FEATURES

  • LEARN 100 WORDS THAT MAKE UP 50 % OF ALL CONVERSATION IN A LANGUAGE. These 100 words are included in the Lingibli phrases and the sentences. The 100 words are based on the research of Tony Buzan, inventor of the famous mind mapping technique.

  • SCAN THE QR CODE. Hear the new words correctly pronounced and feel free to repeat them out loud.

  • LEARN WITH MULTIPLE SENSES. You learn faster when listening, reading and moving at the same time.

  • GET 100 USEFUL PHRASES FOR CONVERSATION SORTED BY TOPIC: Basic Talking, Numbers, Traveling, Shopping & Money, Eating & Drinking, Emotions, Getting Help…

  • GET 100 SENTENCES TO BUILD UP YOUR VOCABULARY. With each word you get 5 sentences to understand how the word is used.

  • HEAR THE PRONUNCIATION OF ALL 200 WORDS, PHRASES AND SENTENCES in the App with just one click. —————————-

Lingibli - Start Learning a New Language!
